title: Scent of Ramadan 2026: Arabic fragrances trending in men’s style section this season in the Gulf
summary_full: Ramadan 2026 sees fragrance taking centre stage in the Gulf. Arabic cologne trends focus on heritage notes with modern touches. Woody, oud, amber and spicy oriental scents are popular. Fresh-spice hybrids offer a modern twist. Musk and soft leather accents provide subtle sophistication. Fragrances honour moments from prayers to Eid embraces.
